scripts.start: npm config set registry https://registry.yarnpkg.com && npx -y -p typescript -p ts-node ts-node --skipProject bin/pre_load_configuration.ts && ts-node --skipProject bin/start.ts
scripts.test: npm config set registry https://registry.yarnpkg.com && npx -y -p typescript -p ts-node ts-node --skipProject bin/pre_load_configuration.ts && ts-node --skipProject bin/test.ts
scripts.test:open: npm config set registry https://registry.yarnpkg.com && npx -y -p typescript -p ts-node ts-node --skipProject bin/pre_load_configuration.ts && ts-node --skipProject bin/TestOpen.ts
scripts.production:install: npm config set registry https://registry.yarnpkg.com && npx -y -p typescript -p ts-node ts-node --skipProject bin/pre_load_configuration.ts
